commitBallot(bytes32,uint256).details: Submit a commitment for the current ballot

params.commitHash: The hash representing the voter's vote choices
params.numTokens: The number of vote tokens to use

params._startTime: The start time of the first batch

contestSlates(uint256,uint256).details: Return the IDs of the slates associated with the contest

contestStatus(uint256,uint256).details: Return the status of the specified contest

countRunoffVotes(uint256,uint256).details: Trigger a runoff count and update the status of the contest Revert if a runoff is not pending. Eliminate all slates but the top two from the confidence vote. Re-count, including the second-choice votes for the top two slates. The slate with the most votes wins. In case of a tie, the earliest slate submitted (slate with the lowest ID) wins.

params.categoryID: The category to count votes for

countVotes(uint256,uint256).details: Trigger a vote count and update the status of the contest Count the first choice votes for each slate. If a slate has more than 50% of the votes, then it wins and the vote is finalized. Otherwise, wait for a runoff.

params.categoryID: The category to count votes for

currentBatchNumber().details: Get the number of the current batch.

currentEpochNumber().details: Get the number of the current epoch.

currentEpochStart().details: Get the start of the current epoch.

depositVoteTokens(uint256).details: Deposit `numToken` tokens into the Gatekeeper to use in voting Assumes that `msg.sender` has approved the Gatekeeper to spend on their behalf

params.numTokens: The number of tokens to devote to voting

didCommit(uint256,address).details: Return true if the voter has committed for the given ballot

didReveal(uint256,address).details: Return true if the voter has revealed for the given ballot

donateChallengerStakes(uint256,uint256).details: Send tokens of the rejected slates to the token capacitor.

getCommitHash(uint256,address).details: Get the commit hash for a given voter and ballot. Revert if voter has not committed yet.

getFirstChoiceVotes(uint256,uint256,uint.details: Get the number of first-choice votes cast for the given slate and category

getSecondChoiceVotes(uint256,uint256,uin.details: Get the number of second-choice votes cast for the given slate and category

getWinningSlate(uint256,uint256).details: Return the ID of the winning slate for the given ballot and category Revert if the vote has not been finalized yet.

hasPermission(uint256).details: Return true if the requestID has been approved via slate governance

params.requestID: The ID of the request to check

recommendSlate(uint256,uint256[],bytes).details: Create a new slate with the associated requestIds and metadata hash.

params.categoryID: The category to submit the slate for
params.metadataHash: A reference to metadata about the slate
params.requestIDs: A list of request IDs to include in the slate

requestPermission(bytes).details: Request permission to perform the action described in the metadataHash

params.metadataHash: A reference to metadata about the action

revealBallot(address,uint256[],uint256[].details: Reveal a given voter's choices for the current ballot and record their choices

params.salt: The salt used to generate the original commitment

slateRequests(uint256).details: Get a list of the requests associated with a slate

stakeTokens(uint256).details: Stake tokens on the given slate to include it for consideration in votes. If the slate loses in a contest, the amount staked will go to the winner. If it wins, it will be returned.

withdrawStake(uint256).details: Withdraw tokens previously staked on a slate that was accepted through slate governance.

params.slateID: The slate to withdraw the stake from

withdrawVoteTokens(uint256).details: Withdraw `numTokens` vote tokens to the caller and decrease voting power

params.numTokens: The number of tokens to withdraw
